version_description:
Fixed crash when tap on the "Folders" section, in addition to some improvements:
- Choose a file view as (Big or Medium or Small)
- Add effects of the images
- Bug fixes
- New button "Select all" in files
- Some improvements
---


: تم اصلاح مشكلة الكراش غالبا عند الدخول الى الملفات وبعض الاصلاحات والتحسينات منها :
- اختيار طريقة عرض الملفات بشكل ( صغير او متوسط او كبير )
- تحسين في المشغل وامكانية التنقل بين المقاطع والتكرار..الخ
- يمكنك اضافة تاثيرات على الصور
- اصلاح بعض المشاكل
- زر جديد لتحديد كل الملفات بنقرة زر
- تحسينات واضافات جديدة والمزيد.

- New Option 'Info File' for show info file Name,Size,Date .etc
- Added German Language
- Added Feature 'Tool Writing' for Writing, Draw and add Sticker to Photos & Videos
- Fix a some bugs

Fix a crash when lock app via Face ID for iPhone X,XS,XR and XS Max,
Fix a some bugs.
Added more improvements and fixed some problems

- Support 3D Touch
- bug fixes and Add improvements
Thank you for using app, In this update you can search in your files easily and bug some fix

√ This Update supports iCloud
√ Support iOS 13 and DarkMode
√ It allows files to be viewed in a collection view
√ Bug fixes

- Improved grid display
- the size of texts in the application became better
- General improvements to the appearance of the application
- Added the appearance in new colors
- Added the shuffle play feature in the player
- Player speed control feature
- Add the equalizer feature to control and customize the sound according to your desire for the player
- Solve the problem of the black screen in the player
- Solve some previous problems

- Feature of remove the background of the images using artificial intelligence or using the brush
- Support iOS 14 and Widgets
- Support Picture in Picture in player
- Bug fixes
